full_summary:
=====================================================


### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
### Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Reference Number:** PW-_MTR-500-16544
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** E6MON-22PQBO/B
**Publication Date:** December 02, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 15, 2022 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** December 09, 2022

### Contractor and Employee Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Name:** Andy Doucette (mtr340)
* **E-mail Address:** <andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* **Phone Number:** (514) 605-3829
* **Address:** Place Bonaventure, portail Sud-Ouest
                      800, rue de La Gauchetière Ouest
                      7e étage, suite 7300
                      Montreal, Quebec H5A 1L6

### Description of Goods or Services

The procurement will involve the provision of Bakery Products.

The purchase will be made in accordance with the WTO GPA, CETA, CPTPP, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the UK.

### Eligibility Requirements and Terms and Conditions

* **Eligible Suppliers:** All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
* **Competition Strategy:** The lowest bid response will be selected.
* **Bidding Requirements:** BIDS MUST BE SUBMITTED ELECTRONICALLY TO PWGSC'S BID RECEIVING UNIT. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.

### Document Availability

The tender documents can be found at [Canada Bid](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Additional Requirements

All interested suppliers must refer to Annex A of the solicitation document for details on any additional requirements associated with this Request for Standing Offers.

### Submission Requirements

Offerors must submit bids electronically using the Canada Post Connect service. For more information on the use of Connect, please see the following link: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/steps-to-follow-for-the-bid-submission-to-bid-receiving-unit-bru-using-epost-connect](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/steps-to-follow-for-the-bid-submission-to-bid-receiving-unit-bru-using-epost-connect).
